title: BigAir Lag Spikes
body:
I've always been using BigAir as an ISP since a year ago, and while they give subpar ping, around 75~150, now I've been getting lag spikes as well.
It's been a horrible experience trying to play the game, and now I can't even play it at anytime due to lag spikes.

Also, the game tends to freeze at the loading screen but I fixed this by loading the forums, which for some reason helps.

replies.body: Wondering if you have your problem fixed, cause I've had the same problem recently

Hello,

Have you checked with your ISP to see if the issue is on their side? It'll be interesting to see if anyone else is struggling with the same issue.
